start.text: Weapon safeties are off. Let's see how much these ships pay out.
I could've lived my entire life planetbound. Give me space any day.
Hell of a day to be bringing multi-lock weapons out.
You know I wanted to pilot starliners as a kid. Oh... how far I've fallen.
I'm always all business. My best investment? This multimillion dollar war machine.

start_boss.text: Us versus that... Yup, that's what we're doing now. N-no big deal, right? Right?
Who the hell thought this was a good idea?!

retreat.text: Let's go while we have the window.
Careful's my last name and safety's my mom. Let's go.

out_of_missiles.text: Damn, we're out. Can someone else cover for us?

engaged.text: Nothing like a dance-off. Merging now.
Guess we're doing this. I'm throwing in!

need_help.text: Wew. Hah, see, real easy. I can do this with one hand behind my back. Yep, that's me. Help.
Hey guys, lend us a hand here?

pursuing.text: Nobody needs to die. Not when this fight's about to be over.
Why are you even trying?! God damn, just surrender already! Don't make me do this!

running.text: Yeah, nope, I'm winchester anyway, let's go!
You don't get to tell me twice. I'm out.
We should be getting out of the AO, out of this country!

hull_90.text: Some seasoned pilots we've got here. Damn!
Yeah, I ain't getting paid enough to be shot at like this!
Oh, man. Is it me, or am I smelling smoke on the bridge?

hull_50.text: Ah, God damn, still going at it, huh? Fine, we'll play ball!
I'd take a year off after this if I had a choice.

hull_30.text: I.. I just need to lay down somewhere...
Ugh, it feels like I'm gonna bite through my teeth, here!

overload.text: A little more warning would have been nice!
How in God's name are we not dead...?
I don't like our odds here!

death.text: It's alright, I probably deserved it at some point.

victory.text: You think we could reserve some nice quarters next time we dock? you know, in exchange for our good work out here.
They wanted to go down fighting. Stupid bastards.
